title: All the News We Covered This Week
description: Winners of this year's Nebula Awards and Women's Prizes, Shirley Jackson Awards nominees, most read and bestselling books, and more.
author: S. Zainab Williams
excerpt: Winners of this year's Nebula Awards and Women's Prizes, Shirley Jackson Awards nominees, most read and bestselling books, and more.
text: S. Zainab Williams Executive Director, Content S. Zainab would like to think she bleeds ink but the very idea makes her feel faint. S. Zainab Williams

Executive Director, Content

S. Zainab would like to think she bleeds ink but the very idea makes her feel faint. She writes fantasy and horror, and is currently clutching a manuscript while groping in the dark. Find her on Twitter: @szainabwilliams.
